projects.title: JPL PPL (Coding Competition Platform)
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive competitive coding platform for JPL-PPL event at SISTec-R. Features include participant registration system, real-time quiz interface with integrated Monaco Editor for live code compilation, automated result tracking, and 24×7 AI chatbot support for participant assistance. The platform successfully handled 200+ concurrent users during the event.

projects.title: Sankat Mochan – Hospital Management System
projects.description: Built a comprehensive Hospital Management System to digitize healthcare operations. Features real-time queue management, intelligent bed allocation system, pharmacy inventory management, patient-doctor coordination dashboard, AI-powered medical report analysis and generation, and 24×7 chatbot support. Designed to improve hospital efficiency and patient experience with role-based access for administrators, doctors, and patients.

projects.title: Collaborative Notes Editor
projects.description: Created a versatile note-taking application with dual-access functionality. Users can create public notes (accessible without authentication) for sharing information or private notes (requires secure login) for personal use. Features include rich text editing, note categorization, search functionality, and responsive design for seamless cross-device experience.

projects.title: AI-Powered Portfolio Chatbot
projects.description: Developed an intelligent AI chatbot integrated into my portfolio website that acts as a virtual assistant. The bot is trained on my profile data and can answer visitor queries about my skills, projects, experience, and availability. Uses natural language processing to provide human-like responses and enhance user engagement by 300%.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio v2.0
projects.description: Redesigned personal portfolio with modern UI/UX principles, featuring smooth animations, interactive project showcases, skills visualization, and responsive design. Implemented dark/light theme toggle, lazy loading for optimized performance, and SEO optimization for better discoverability. Achieved 95+ Google Lighthouse score.

projects.title: Police MIS – Bhopal Division
projects.description: Designed and implemented a Management Information System to connect 50+ police stations across Bhopal for centralized operations. Key features include live case tracking and status updates, officer leave management system, personnel transfer module, centralized case database with advanced search, report generation, and inter-station communication tools. Improved operational efficiency by 40%.

projects.title: Rentify – Property Rental Platform
projects.description: Built a full-stack real estate rental marketplace connecting property owners with potential tenants. Features include advanced property listing management, location-based search with Google Maps integration, property comparison tool, secure payment gateway integration, user verification system, rating and review functionality, and separate dashboards for landlords and tenants with role-based access control.

projects.title: Asual – Fashion E-commerce Platform (Freelance)
projects.description: Freelance project for a clothing brand startup. Developed a complete e-commerce solution with product catalog, smart filtering and sorting, shopping cart with persistent sessions, secure checkout process, payment gateway integration, order tracking system, admin panel for inventory management, and responsive design for mobile commerce. Successfully processed 500+ orders in first quarter.

projects.title: Crystal & Cannel by Zenaura – Luxury E-commerce (Freelance)
projects.description: Developed a premium MERN stack e-commerce platform for Zenaura's luxury brand 'Crystal & Cannel'. Features include Google OAuth integration for seamless login, secure payment processing with Razorpay, advanced product filtering, wishlist functionality, order management dashboard, real-time inventory tracking, email notifications, and elegant UI/UX with high-quality product galleries. Achieved 99.9% uptime and 4.8/5 customer satisfaction.

projects.title: The Gypsy Adventures – Tourism Platform
projects.description: Full-stack tourism and travel booking platform featuring tour package browsing, hotel booking integration with external APIs, multi-step booking forms with validation, payment gateway integration, admin dashboard for content management, user authentication and profile management, testimonials and reviews section, and responsive design with image optimization. Currently serving 100+ active users.
